title: [Large-scale] Game-Based Mobile Library Exploration: Science Research Competency Enhancement for Graduate Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic research skills and understanding of graduate-level research methodologies
context.additional_context: Microlearning implementation via smartphones in PC-unavailable environments, with intensive training on library systems supporting scientific research

learning_goals: Learners can search for papers in specific scientific fields in academic databases (Scopus, Web of Science) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can complete the procedure for reserving study spaces using the library seat reservation system within three attempts
Learners can systematically manage over ten references using library services integrated with reference management tools (Zotero, Mendeley)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
